The video below discusses the `purrr` package. The functions from this package are the `tidyverse` version of the `apply` family of functions. In some ways they are easier to use and in some ways harder! 

I highly recommend watching the video using the 'full' Panopto player. There is a 'pop out' button in the bottom right of the video to enter this viewer.
